message.body: Hey! When you feed Lincoln dinner tomorrow, give him 1/3 of a can of food with 1 Pepcid and 1 Cipro pill. I'll be at Beau from 9am until midnight if you need me:-)
Sorry, screwed up the meds. You just need to give him the Pepcid at night. I'll give him the Cipro in the morning.
Lincoln's dinner is portioned out and in a Tupperware with green lid in the fridge. Just microwave it for 20 sec and stick the Pepcid in with it. Thanks!
No problem, hope your day isn't too crazy.
Thanks. I have a feeling it'll be nuts, but looking forward to the barrel of cash at the end of the rainbow!
Walked and fed Lincoln did lunch walk too. He didn't want to be out long in the cold and only did one small poop each walk. Plenty of pee though.
